item.title: 气候技术风险投资人突然会说特朗普的语言了
item.description:
该行业正在使用与当选总统一致的流行语，强调能源独立和创造就业机会。【原文：

The industry is using buzzwords that align with the president-elect, emphasizing energy independence and job creation.

】

item.title: 特朗普的海湾交易商帮助家族在房地产热潮中套现
item.description: 要想了解特朗普组织在中东的商业野心，齐亚德-埃尔-查尔（Ziad El Chaar）是不二人选。【原文：To get a sense of the Trump Organization’s business ambitions in the Middle East, look no further than Ziad El Chaar.】

item.title: 5000 亿美元大单引发华尔街被动争议
item.description: 被动投资的巨轮正在加速前进；它在整个华尔街激起了对指数追踪热潮所带来的危险的新忧虑。【原文：The passive-investing juggernaut is picking up speed — and it’s stirring up fresh angst about the dangers posed by the index-tracking boom across Wall Street.】

item.title: 钻石销售下滑，博茨瓦纳面临 2020 年以来最严重的经济衰退
item.description: 博茨瓦纳财政部长恩达巴-高拉特（Ndaba Gaolathe）表示，由于该国的主要出口商品钻石销售长期低迷，博茨瓦纳今年的经济可能萎缩1.7%。【原文：Botswana’s economy may contract by 1.7% this year due to a prolonged downturn in diamond sales, the country’s primary export commodity, Finance Minister Ndaba Gaolathe said.】

item.title: LG 电子是测试印度飙升的 IPO 市场的最新企业
item.description: 总部位于韩国的 LG 电子公司印度分公司申请首次公开募股，这是外国公司在南亚国家蓬勃发展的市场上寻求投资者的最新举措。【原文：The Indian unit of South Korea-based LG Electronics Inc. filed for an initial public offering, the latest among foreign companies looking to tap investors in the South Asian country’s booming market.】

item.title: 肯尼亚中央银行要求增长乏力的银行积极降息
item.description: 肯尼亚央行行长卡马乌-图格（Kamau Thugge）要求贷款机构降低商业贷款利率，以反映借贷成本的下降，从而帮助刺激东非经济。【原文：Kenya’s central bank Governor Kamau Thugge asked lenders to slash commercial loan rates to reflect dropping borrowing costs to help stimulate the East African economy.】

item.title: 特朗普上任前加拿大汽车产量下降，底特律撤军
item.description: 据一家制造业智囊团称，由于美国公司在加拿大的工厂因需求放缓而闲置，加拿大汽车厂今年将生产约 130 万辆汽车，这是除科维德大流行病之外几十年来的最低水平。【原文：Canadian automobile plants are set to produce about 1.3 million vehicles this year, the lowest level in decades outside the Covid pandemic, as US companies idle factories in the country amid slowing demand, according to a manufacturing think-tank.】

item.title: 贝莱德豪赌 GIP 使芬克的公司成为当地焦点
item.description: 在明尼苏达州的港口城市德卢斯，当地的活动家和总部设在华盛顿的团体正联合起来，对全球基础设施合伙公司（Global Infrastructure Partners）斥资 62 亿美元收购一家电力公司的交易进行审查，并可能阻止该交易。【原文：In the port city of Duluth, Minnesota, local activists and Washington-based groups are coalescing to scrutinize — and possibly stall — a $6.2 billion acquisition of a power utility led by Global Infrastructure Partners.】

item.title: 丑闻之后，麦肯锡与南非集团共同参与 20 国集团活动
item.description: 麦肯锡公司正与南非的一个商业联盟组织合作筹备一项活动，旨在将全球政策制定者、民间社会组织和商界领袖联系起来，该活动将成为明年 20 国集团会议的一部分。【原文：McKinsey & Co. is partnering with a South African business-lobby group to prepare for an event aimed at connecting global policymakers, civil-society organizations and business leaders that will form part of next year’s Group of 20 gatherings.】

item.title: 英国央行行长丁格拉称需要降息，因为政策过于严格
item.description: 英格兰银行决策者斯瓦蒂-丁格拉（Swati Dhingra）警告说，高利率抑制了消费者支出和企业投资，对经济造成了过重的影响。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Swati Dhingra warned that high interest rates are bearing down too heavily on the economy by curbing consumer spending and business investment.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行德国分行在 2 亿欧元增值税欺诈案调查中遭到突袭
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，欧洲检察官突袭了联合信贷银行（UniCredit）位于慕尼黑的一个部门，调查可能存在的 2 亿欧元（约合 2.12 亿美元）税务欺诈案。【原文：European prosecutors have raided a UniCredit unit in Munich in a probe investigating a possible €200 million ($212 million) tax fraud, according to a person familiar.】

item.title: Waymo 的扩张引发了人工智能接管的担忧
item.description: 随着 Waymo 将其计划扩展到更多美国城市，我们会看到更多针对自动驾驶汽车的破坏行为吗？但首先...【原文：As Waymo expands its plans to even more US cities, will we see more vandalism against self-driving cars? But first...】

item.title: 据说欧洲央行将就 SRT 买家使用杠杆的问题询问一些银行
item.description: 欧洲中央银行正在收集有关投资者在重大风险转移中使用债务杠杆的信息，因为监管机构正在仔细审查贷款人用来释放资本的这一日益流行的工具。【原文：The European Central Bank is gathering information about the use of debt leverage by investors in significant risk transfers, as watchdogs scrutinize the increasingly popular tool used by lenders to free up capital.】

item.title: 很难知道世界上大部分海鲜从何而来
item.description: 全球海鲜和鱼类的运输价值约为 1950 亿美元，是交易量最大的食品行业之一。但是，要准确了解这些产品的来源可能是一个谜。【原文：Global seafood and fish shipments are worth about $195 billion, making it one of the most traded food-commodity sectors. But knowing exactly where those products come from can be a mystery.】

item.title: 实时货币政策实验
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天，我和斯瓦蒂-潘迪（Swati Pandey）将探讨南半球国家的货币政策，以及美联储和其他国家可以从不同的方法中学到什么。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today, Swati Pandey and I look at the monetary policy in the antipodes and what the Fed and others can learn from different approaches. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 米莱因爱尔兰人不喜欢的经济数据而钦佩爱尔兰
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统希望以爱尔兰在过去三十年中扭转命运的方式来改革阿根廷的经济。爱尔兰人认为他们自己的故事有更多的细微差别。【原文：President Javier Milei aspires to reform Argentina’s economy in the way Ireland turned around its fortunes over the past three decades. The Irish see more nuance to their own story.】

item.title: 挪威金融监管局认为房价有大幅上涨的风险
item.description: 挪威金融监督机构警告说，挪威是发达国家中家庭负债最多的国家，该国银行可能面临房价上涨带来的更高风险。【原文：Norway’s banks may face higher risks from a potential home price rally in a nation with the most indebted households in the developed world, its financial watchdog warned.】

item.title: 据说降临信托将为 250 亿美元的新基金招募投资者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，收购公司安宏资本（Advent）已开始为新的旗舰基金拉拢投资者，该基金的规模可能与其之前创下的 250 亿美元纪录相近。【原文：Buyout firm Advent has started canvassing investors for a new flagship fund, which could be of similar size to its previous record-setting $25 billion vehicle, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 供应担忧加剧，可可价格回升至每吨 10,000 美元
item.description: 可可期货攀升至近六个月来的最高点，原因是人们越来越担心西非产量下降，而全球供应已经十分紧张。【原文：Cocoa futures climbed to the highest in nearly six months on mounting concerns over lower output in West Africa, with global supplies already tight.】

item.title: Gaw Capital 领导的集团将对用于购买香港大厦的贷款进行再融资
item.description: 以香港基金管理公司 Gaw Capital Partners 为首的一个投资者财团正在寻求 54 亿港元（6.94 亿美元）的贷款，用于收购太古城中心一号办公楼的债务再融资。【原文：A consortium of investors led by Hong Kong-based fund manager Gaw Capital Partners is seeking a HK$5.4 billion ($694 million) loan to refinance the debt used to back the acquisition of Cityplaza One office tower.】

item.title: 英特尔缺乏明确计划令华尔街更加看空
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）今年的股价已经很不乐观。但这家芯片制造商突然撤换首席执行官，导致更多投资者放弃投资。【原文：Things were already looking bad for Intel Corp. shares this year. But the chipmaker’s sudden ouster of its chief executive officer has led to even more investors throwing in the towel.】

item.title: 卫报》所有者拟将《观察家报》出售给 Tortoise，获得 2500 万英镑投资
item.description: 英国卫报传媒集团已同意将世界上历史最悠久的周日报纸《观察家报》出售给网络新闻创业公司 Tortoise Media。【原文：The UK’s Guardian Media Group has agreed to sell the Observer, the world’s oldest Sunday newspaper, to online news startup Tortoise Media.】

item.title: 比特币牛市在 100,000 美元里程碑之后胜利一圈
item.description: 数字资产行业往往会吸引这样的人 他们看着令人惊叹的企业欺诈和一系列破产的残骸 然后宣布："是时候建设了"【原文：The digital-asset industry tends to attract people who can look at the wreckage of breathtaking corporate fraud and a slew of bankruptcies and declare: “It’s time to build.”】

item.title: 华尔街债券卖家期待 2024 年更大的红利回报
item.description: 据招聘和薪酬专家称，帮助公司出售债务的华尔街银行家们有望在 2024 年因其工作获得更多奖金，如果发行趋势持续下去，明年可能会获得更高的奖励。【原文：Wall Street bankers who help companies sell debt are poised to get bigger bonuses for their work in 2024 and may collect even higher rewards next year if issuance trends continue, according to recruiting and compensation specialists.】

item.title: 债务裂痕显现，中国万科销售下滑加剧
item.description: 中国万科股份有限公司（China Vanke Co., Ltd.）的销售下滑在 11 月份进一步加剧，加剧了人们对该公司在长期房地产危机中财务状况恶化的担忧。【原文：China Vanke Co.’s sales slump worsened in November, adding to concern over its worsening finances during a prolonged property crisis.】

item.title: 投资者重回法国，法国混乱一周圆满结束
item.description: 在法国政府垮台的这一周，拥有法国资产的时机并不差。【原文：In a week that saw the collapse of the French government, it wasn’t a bad time to be owning French assets.】

item.title: 25 亿美元首次公开募股后，阿曼 OQ 公司考虑出售更多股票
item.description: 在 2024 年以近 25 亿美元的交易额成为中东地区最大的首次公开募股发行商之后，阿曼的主要能源公司正寻求在未来几年内将更多单位上市。【原文：The main energy company in Oman is looking to list more units in the next couple of years, after it became the biggest initial public offering issuer in the Middle East in 2024 with almost $2.5 billion of deals.】

item.title: 追逐纪录的 ETF 投资者蜂拥而至，以太币备受瞩目
item.description: 在比特币突破 10 万美元的阴影下，以太币的涨势正在加速，投资者押注这种第二大加密货币将超过三年前创下的纪录。【原文：In the shadow of Bitcoin topping $100,000, a rally in Ether is building steam, with investors betting the second-biggest cryptocurrency will surpass the record it reached three years ago.】

item.title: 南非橄榄球联盟阻止阿克利私募股权收购案
item.description: 南非国家橄榄球队（Springboks）是世界上排名最高的国家橄榄球队，其商业经营权的私募股权交易备受争议，该交易已被否决，这给因财务不稳定而备受困扰的体育管理机构带来了打击。【原文：A controversial private equity deal over the commercial rights to the world’s highest-ranked national rugby team, South Africa’s Springboks, has been rejected, dealing a blow to a sports authority vexed by financial instability.】

item.title: 欧元区消费者终于开始消费，推动经济增长
item.description: 欧元区第三季度私人消费增幅为两年来最大，为购物者最终开始推动经济复苏带来了希望。【原文：Private consumption in the euro area jumped by the most in two years in the third quarter, offering hope that shoppers are finally starting to power an economic recovery.】
